page.title: 17HALE HOT AIR BALLOON CLUB
page.content: My Dad is a hot air balloon pilot and sometimes I fly with him, but usually I help to do retrieve. Sometimes we lose the balloons but mostly we manage to keep them in sight. I help to roll up the envelope and pack it into its bag. The Club has got three balloons. Superwasp has yellow and black stripes, Ladybird has red and black stripes and Glow-worm, which is a five-man balloon, is yellow with blue stripes at the bottom. The balloons go up early in the morning or late in the afternoon, otherwise the thermals make it dan- gerous, but sometimes we do tethered flights at Shows for people to watch. A little while ago two of our Dads did a night flight in Glow-worm, from Hale to Ross-on-Wye. It was about 80 miles and it took 3 hours,20 minutes.
